name: Love Design-Home Makeover
description:
From a dilapidated apartment to your own mansion, build your dream home improvement! A variety of decoration styles, rich and varied levels to eliminate, design and decorate your dream home!
Life is always full of surprises and challenges. Clara started living alone after graduating from university. She met the best buddies, kind landlords, and a few boys that she will never forget. How did she live a better life through her own efforts? Come to Love Design now to design your love home!From a dilapidated apartment to your own mansion, build your dream home improvement! 描述：
Game features:
* House design: House design with super high degree of freedom, with a variety of styles as you like!
* Fun match-3: Massive levels and a variety of cool props, more ways to play and more fun!
* The plot is exquisite: all the plots revolve around you, super substitution into the perfect experience!
* Moving characters: Lively and interesting game characters that will show you the full story!
* Multi-houses: Is it not fun to decorate one set? More houses are waiting for you to design!
It's time to show your design talent, take control of every detail, and decorate your home like you dreamed of!
